question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.


You now find that you cannot continue the course.


Write a letter to your teachers. In your letter


describe the situation


explain why you cannot continue at this time


say what action you would like to take
text: I am one of your current students on your course of introduction to coding. I am afraid that I have to withdrawal from it due to my personal issue. I am writing this letter to let you know.

First, I have no means to express any dissatisfaction regarding your teaching, in fact, I enjoy the class atmosphere and style of demonstrating, which turns tedious principles into interesting skills. In addition, I always ego to expand my personal skills, especially computer skills, which are considered to be useful in my job.

However, I recently was assigned  a manager position in another city by a company, although I really want to remain in this class, I will not able to present the rest of the sessions. Hope you could understand my situation, and let me know whether could I get a partial refund when I withdrawal from the class.
